comments.author: Darker45
comments.body: First, you have to make sure that you deserve the prize. There are cases when gambling platforms refuse to give the prize because it is won via a violation of their terms and conditions or in unfair ways. For example, you won the jackpot but it is found out that you are a resident of a blacklisted country. You might not receive your money in this case. Or if you've won the jackpot through a bet that is already beyond the maximum. There are actually many possible reasons why a prize could be forfeited. Whether or not it is fair for the platform to allow the gambler to bet only to be told of his/her violation once he/she has won big, that's another story. But if you're already certain that you truly deserve the prize or that you won it fair and square, then communicate with the platform's official channels. If they still won't pay up, then you could bring the case to a competent lawyer for possible legal proceedings against the site.
